description:
Strategic Economic Policy
Formerly National Human Dev't report

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
Capacity of Ministries Departments and Agencies Municipal Metropolitan and District Assemblies strengthened to develop and 	implement MDG based development frameworks. National statistical data consistently updated, made available and inform    decision making
MDG based key national/local development challenges  and policy options identified
subproject.title: National Development policy
